personalInfo.name: Khairil
personalInfo.title: FrontEnd Develover
personalInfo.bio: I'm an Information Systems student who loves programming, especially Front-End Development. I'm committed to improving my skills and knowledge to keep up with the latest technology.

projects.title: Sobat Takwa
projects.description: A web app offers a user-friendly interface with access to prayer schedules, Quran reading with audio support, and daily prayers, all with a search function.

projects.title: Cihuy Movie
projects.description: Cihuy Movie is a web app for discovering and organizing popular movies and TV shows, featuring daily and weekly trending lists. Built with TypeScript, React-router, Vite, and ChakraUI, it includes discovery pages with pagination, a search function, and Firebase Authentication, allowing users to create a personalized watchlist.

projects.title: Saas NotesApp
projects.description: This SaaS app lets users manage notes and subscribe to premium services. Free users can create up to 5 notes before needing a subscription. Key features include a Stripe Customer Portal, Stripe Checkout, server-side implementation, full CRUD for notes, and customizable color themes.

education.institution: State Islamic University of Imam Bonjol Padang
education.description: Relevant Coursework: Data structures, algorithms, software engineering, databases, and UI/UX design.

I took a course at Dicoding Academy to learn how to create web apps. For my final project, I made a web-based to-do list and note application. I also learned how to make web apps that are responsive, scalable, and secure.
